title: New Orleans Jazz Vipers - 2003 - New Orleans Jazz Vipers FLAC
description:
New Orleans Jazz Vipers - 2003 - New Orleans Jazz Vipers

First CD from the popular and award-winning New Orleans Jazz Vipers, a six-piece acoustic swing band featuring (on this CD) John Rodli on guitar and vocals, Joe Braun on saxophone and vocals, Ja Ja Duval on trombone, Linnzi Zaorski on vocals, Steve Yokum on trombone and vocals, and Neti Vaan on fiddle.
The New Orleans Jazz Vipers were the winners of the New Orleans Big Easy Award in 2005 for "Best Traditional Jazz Band."
"The New Orleans Jazz Vipers are a big reason why the Spotted Cat went from being a Frenchmen Street curiosity for passersby to a vital neo-tradjazz hot spot. This isn't your older brother's cover band either; the Vipers respect for the old ways translates into more obscure works from folks like Benny Carter or Count Basie, instead of going with the obvious."
"...bands like the New Orleans Jazz Vipers are pumping up New Orleans' most famous musical export with hip Faubourg Marigny attitude."
"They Sound Good in Sunlight Too: The New Orleans Jazz Vipers made an effortless transition from the late-night vibe of their regular Spotted Cat gig to an afternoon set in blazing sun on the Lagniappe Stage (New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Fest). The band's acoustic sound was a perfect fit..."
--- Gambit, New Orleans
(cdbaby)

Track list:
01 - Mean to Me
02 - Blue Drag
03 - If I Could Be with You (One Hour Tonight)
04 - Digga-Digga-Do
05 - Foolin' Myself
06 - The Mooche
07 - Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
08 - When It's Sleepytime Down South
09 - Somebody Loves Me
10 - Blues in My Heart
11 - Bei Mir Bist Du Schon
12 - Evenin'

Personnel:
Joe Braun - saxophone; lead vocal on tracks 3, 9 & 12
Genevieve Duval - trombone
John Rodli - guitar; lead vocal on tracks 2, 4 & 10
Neti Vaan - fiddle
Clay Windham - bass
Steve Yokum - trombone; lead vocal on track 8
Linnzi Zaorski - lead vocal on tracks 1, 5, 7 & 11

Enjoy and share!
